text:
'Poseidon and Cleito' [333 AQ], parents of the five pairs of Atlantean twins. 
Atlantis defended by two rings of land (and three of water, however that is to be construed), so its concentric pattern is approximately ((0)), with '0' marking the island. 
Plato's Critias (p.137 in my English edition)
Because America is a constitutional republic, we still have to listen to enraged homosexuals even after their repudiation at the ballot box.

Serially complex, but from a parallel perspective over simplified. There needs to be environmental selective pressure towards multiplying them, which requires that parallel redundancy isn't accounted simply as a cost to be tendentially reduced. ...

... This has much in common with the topic of monopoly in microeconomics, i.e. the need to ensure that simplified selection of the best outcome from competition doesn't suppress competition. It's what the virtue of 'diversity' would be in a sane world.

... Globalization in its dominant asymmetric neoliberal form was baptized 'Globohomo' (global homogenization) because it was recognized as essentially antipathetic to robust diversity, impoverishing planetary social ecology, and fragilizing the world economy. ...
People would rather be humiliated continuously than read that book (so everything is going to be okay).
... Frankly doubt that I'm going to read it anytime soon, which is obviously ridiculous.
